message: First off, I love what you guys are doing with Convore. That said, it would be nice to be able to edit a post, instead of deleting and re-creating it, in the event I make any errors. The other request I have is to allow for searching within a Group alone. AFAIK, the current search spans all Groups. It would be great if I could specify the particular group I want to search on. Other than that, I must say, Convore is definitely growing on me :)
If they give you like 10mins or something buffered time

I agree that this might be handy if it happened within some type of relatively low timeframe before you were no longer able to edit it. I would guess most people read their posts again after actually submitting them, so even a couple of minutes would work. I think it needs to be low, though, to keep people from changing things in the middle of a conversation.
